name: Ollga Belova
what_you_do: Dr. Ollga Belova is the creator of the Purpose to Profit Quantum Leap System.
who_you_serve: Solopreneurs and business owners who lead teams
offering: Programs to help solopreneurs and business owners align their purpose and money, and to help business owners set up their team for self-management and profit
social_proof: Debra Poneman, Lynnea Annette Brumbaugh, and Jessica Schnieder provide testimonials about Dr. Ollga's work
signature_programs: Purpose to Profit Series, Culture to Profit Series
business_focus: Helping purpose-driven entrepreneurs align their purpose and money through programs and coaching
service_provided: purpose-to-profit programs, money blocks assessment, business coaching
